description: SDSK files can only be opened by entering the correct password. Once a SafeHouse volume has been opened, the files and folders saved in the volume can be accessed by the user. Files can be added or removed from the volume as long as it is open.
SafeHouse can create an unlimited number of encrypted volumes, though each SDSK file has a maximum file size of 2TB.
NOTE: The SDSK extension is used by SafeHouse 2.0 and later. SafeHouse 1.x saved encrypted volumes with a .DSK extension.
